mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.doctor_id AS "doctorId", a.huizhen_id AS "huizhenId", a.huizhenyijian AS "huizhenyijian", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.qianmingstype AS "qianmingstype", a.qianmingshijian AS "qianmingshijian", a.qianming_id AS "qianmingId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM electron_group_consultation_in a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM electron_group_consultation_in a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO electron_group_consultation_in( id, doctor_id, huizhen_id, huizhenyijian, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by, qianmingstype, qianmingshijian, qianming_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{doctorId}, #{huizhenId}, #{huizhenyijian}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{qianmingstype}, #{qianmingshijian}, #{qianmingId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE electron_group_consultation_in SET doctor_id = #{doctorId}, huizhen_id = #{huizhenId}, huizhenyijian = #{huizhenyijian}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, qianmingstype = #{qianmingstype}, qianmingshijian = #{qianmingshijian}, qianming_id = #{qianmingId} WHERE id = #{id}
